price: Le châtiment, en effet, les saisit. Voilà bien là un prodige. Cependant, la plupart d’entre eux ne croient pas.
arabic: فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱلۡعَذَابُۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhahumu al-ʿadhābu inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
